titleStmt.title: To the right honourable the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of many of the gentry, ministers, free-holders, and other inhabitants of the county of Kent, and the cities of olders, and other inhabitants of the county of Kent, and the cities of Canterbury and Rochester, and county of Canterbury, with the Cinque Ports, and their members, and other corporations within the said county.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: "This petition was delivered and read in the House of Commons the fifth of May 1642 with 8000 hands thereto."
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
